name: Earl's Last Nut
description:
Earls Last Nut is a 2D beat em up game similar to castle crashers. The premise is that the main character is a dentist that is delusional because he hasn’t slept in two days and is eating chocolate covered almonds and his last almond is taken away by a vegetable the evil tomato and he grabs whatever is close by as his weapons which were his dental utilities (toothbrush, toothpaste, floss, toothpick) and tries to get back his chocolate covered almond. The game world is the same as real life but everyone is a food group. The meat and alternative are male, grain products are female, old people are cheese, junk food are the drug addicts, and fruit and vegetables are the enemies. The character has range magic (toothpaste), and melee attacks (toothbrush and there are light and heavy attacks).

This was made by our first year GDW group Zalmon Entertainment.
